channel.title: Challenge?
channel.description:
Ok how can I make Challenge option only be available at edgeville? (Challenge for duel when you right click someone) It's annoying if you have it in wild and you keep challenging instead of attacking..
How can I remove it please help?

item.title: Challenge?
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

So this is it. public void rightClickCheck() { if(!isInDuel()) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Challenge"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

and to make it only edge it would be [code] public void rightClickCheck() {

	if(!isInDuel()) {
		if ((coordY >= 3092) && (coordY <= 3091) && (coordX <= 3499) && (coordX >= 3489)) 
		outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
		outStream.writeByteC(2);
		outStream.writeByteA(0);
		outStream.writeString("Challenge");
		outStream.endFrameVarSize();

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Challenge?
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

before the duel command if player is in X/Y coords?

Else

sendMessage(“You must be in edgeville to use the duel feature”);
